connector.description: Query data from a PostgreSQL Database.

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverNa.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverName
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverNa.description: The server name for the data source. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverPo.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverPort
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.serverPo.description: The server port for the data source.

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.username
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.username.description: The username to access a secured PostgreSQL Database.

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.password
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.password.description: The password to access a secured PostgreSQL Database.

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.query
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.query.description: The query to execute against the PostgreSQL Database. Example: INSERT INTO accounts (username,city) VALUES (:#username,:#city)

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.database.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.databaseName
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.database.description: The name of the PostgreSQL Database.

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.consumed.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.consumedQuery
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.consumed.description: A query to run on a tuple consumed. Example: DELETE FROM accounts where user_id = :#user_id

camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.delay
camel.kamelet.postgresql-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll
